desc: Can’t get those pesky flies to bug off? Try our fly banishing fly traps and enjoy the outdoors in peace. Get rid of pesky flies with Flies Be Gone Fly Traps, a non toxic, poison-free, cruelty-free, risk-free fly trap that eliminates fly infestations for commercial and domestic fly control.

layout.text: Say Goodbye to Pesky Flies with Our Non Toxic Disposable Fly Trap!
Our non toxic disposable fly trap bag utilizes the baiting power of Formula KM34™, a fly food that has proven its fly attracting abilities. Effective against even pesticide resistant flies!
